description:
In this course you will learn the basic concepts, tools and examples of Growth Hacking. "Growth Hacking is a mindset more than a toolset", so be prepared to learn and change the way you think about entrepreneurship and growth.

Learn how to bring qualified traffic to your website with a non traditional methodology

  • Learn the main Growth Hacking techniques
  • Know how famous companies (Airbnb, Dropbox, Candy Crush, Paypal...) have used Growth Hacking techniques
  • Discover the Growth Hacking tools and metrics
  • Apply what you have learned to your business

Contents and Overview

This course contains over 30 lectures. It's designed for anyone who wants to learn more about Growth Hacking.

There is no prerequisites... just a good mindset: if you really want to learn, that's enough.

At the end of the course, you will understand precisely what is Growth Hacking, and you will be an amazing Growth Hacker!
title: Growth Hacking - Drive Traffic & Customers to Your Website
